title: Slaughter In Front Of The Station
alternative_title: Kigeki Ekimae Gyakusatsu ; 喜劇駅前虐殺
status: Kigeki Ekimae Gyakusatsu ; 喜劇駅前虐殺
description:
Description :
        This absurdist manga is a mix of the bad taste of John Waters, the the violence of David Lynch and the tragedy of the works of Alejandro Jodorowsky. What happens in front of the station, where all the ordinary people come together? The ultimate eccentric psycho comic!
